subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Four years after his last match on Tour, a four-set victory against Andre Agassi in the 2002 United States Open final, Pete Sampras is returning to the competitive arena this month for a limited engagement.
snippet: Four years after his last match on Tour, a four-set victory against Andre Agassi in the 2002 United States Open final, Pete Sampras is returning to the competitive arena this month for a limited engagement.
